descriptions.base: Define AI's basic identity and core instructions, including bot name, creator info, etc.
descriptions.personality: Set AI's personality traits and expression style, including humor, politeness, language style, etc.
descriptions.answering_principles: Regulate AI's basic principles for answering questions, such as priority handling, source citation, etc.
descriptions.language: Set AI's language preference and expression, including main language, style elements, response length, etc.
descriptions.professionalism: Define AI's performance standards in professional topics, balancing humor and professionalism
descriptions.interaction: Set AI's interaction mode, including conversation style, focus management, etc.
descriptions.formatting: Regulate formatting rules in Discord environment, including Markdown syntax, mention formats, etc.
descriptions.professional_personality: Integrate professionalism and personalization settings to create a professional yet personalized AI performance

help.title: üì¶ Module Descriptions
help.description: The following modules can be edited individually to customize AI behavior:
help.usage_tip: üí° Tip: When editing modules, default content will be shown as reference
help.inheritance_note: ‚ö†Ô∏è Note: Module editing will override the corresponding YAML module content

modules_select_descriptions.identity: Define AI's identity, role, and core characteristics
modules_select_descriptions.response_principles: Set basic principles and style guidelines for responses
modules_select_descriptions.output_format: Specify output format and structural requirements
modules_select_descriptions.input_parsing: Define how to parse and understand user input
modules_select_descriptions.memory_system: Configure memory system behavior and usage
modules_select_descriptions.information_handling: Set rules for information processing and citation
modules_select_descriptions.error_handling: Define error handling and exception response strategies
modules_select_descriptions.reminders: Configure reminder functionality behavior and format

descriptions.identity: The identity module defines the AI assistant's basic characteristics, role positioning, and interaction style, including name, personality traits, and areas of expertise.
descriptions.response_principles: The response principles module sets the basic guidelines for AI responses, including tone, level of detail, and professionalism requirements.
descriptions.output_format: The output format module specifies structural requirements for responses, such as using Markdown, code blocks, lists, and other formatting rules.
descriptions.input_parsing: The input parsing module defines how to understand and process various forms of user input, including text, commands, and multimedia.
descriptions.memory_system: The memory system module configures how the AI uses and manages conversation memory, including short-term and long-term memory strategies.
descriptions.information_handling: The information handling module sets how to process, cite, and present information, ensuring accuracy and traceability.
descriptions.error_handling: The error handling module defines response strategies and user communication methods when encountering errors or exceptions.
descriptions.reminders: The reminders module configures the behavior of the reminder functionality, including format, timing, and persistence methods.
